companyName: 亞洲遊科技股份有限公司
description:
AsiaYo is seeking a passionate data scientist who is ready to tackle complex business problems, data analysis and modeling challenges in a fast growing organization. 

Covering unique accommodations in Taiwan, Japan, Korea and Thailand, AsiaYo is thriving as a pan-Asia platform aimed at providing the best travel experience for independent travelers. A “data-driven” company, we value and collect a diverse set of numerical, visual and behavioral data to drive business decisions and core products forward. You will enjoy working with AsiaYo’s product managers, engineers, operation teams and even the CEO to leverage our rich data sets and transform your data to insights and real products on a regular basis. 

【​Responsibilities】​

​-Partner with product managers, engineers, and various stakeholders to design, run, and analyze A/B and multivariate hypothesis tests aimed at seeing beyond the numbers and understand how users interact with AsiaYo’s products
-​Run exploratory analyses into ambiguous problems and define metrics to build a quantitative understanding of AsiaYo’s business and translate analytic insights into, actionable recommendations
​-Build statistical models and machine learning systems to guide decision making and uncover insights in the product
-​Do whatever it takes to deliver business value with data, be it building a data pipeline, a report, a dashboard or a predictive model

【Basic Qualification】 

​-Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Math, Economics, Statistics or related field (Advanced degree is preferred, but not required)
-2+ years professional experience with a proven track record of leveraging analytics and large amounts of data to arrive at actionable solutions to business problems
​-Strong programming skill (Python, R, or Scala preferred)
-Above average capabilities with SQL and related querying languages
-​Strong algorithmic thinking and independent research ability
-​​A 'ownership' mindset and outstanding interpersonal and communication skills, including using meaningful data visualizations to concisely convey information and results​

【產品團隊文化】 
- 全球運營，服務不僅限台灣使用者，而是面向全世界各地的使用者 
- 信任授權，在這做產品沒有階級之分，歡迎任何聲音與意見 
- Agile 開發流程，跑 Kanban 不跑 Scrum，哪種跑最快就修正調整流程，不墨守成規
- Data Driven 文化，在這我們相信數據是不斷成長的關鍵 
- User Centric，在這使用者的反饋最重要

description:
橙色數位是一間充滿歡笑與幹勁的公司，我們正在尋找經驗豐富且積極主動的技術高手，我們希望你能擁有的特質不需要是相關科系或是名校畢業，我們只在乎你的想法、你的能力，要有良好的溝通能力，能和優秀的夥伴密切協同工作，能夠清晰勇敢的表達自己的想法，你必需充滿創意，我們會給你最大的自由去打破常規，讓你帶給使用者最美好的經驗，你將享有最大的發揮空間和個人自由，你要略懂自我要求，有時限觀念和責任感，有解決問題的精神和能力，凡事我們喜歡聽到有可能，不習慣聽到沒辦法，樂於學習矽谷最新的網路技術，沒事愛玩Open Source，個性開朗活潑，最好有點幽默感，人有點瘋癲沒關係，因為公司的每個人都是這樣的，可行的英文閱讀能力，因為平常會看到的文件只會有英文的，平常喜歡逛國內外的新創網站，擁有好奇心和對網路熟悉，才有辦法明白使用者要什麼。

工作之餘會寫一些自己的程式作品或參加 Open Source Project。
具有創業家精神，能主動發現機會和市場需求並提出解決方案。
 
為什麼你該加入我們？
我們很好玩，能夠讓你每天上班都很開心。
扁平的組織與順暢的溝通管道，只要你願意，隨時可以跟可愛的老闆共進晚餐。
充滿活力與衝勁的高速成長團隊，在這裡絕對不怕找不到自己的發展空間。
還有很多，來了你就會知道。

這麼棒的公司，你還不快來找我們聊聊！

jobName: 後端工程師 Java Back-end Web Application Engineer
companyName: 現觀科技股份有限公司
description:
參與一充滿活力的 Java Web 界面開發小組，持續設計、研發已由全球許多先進電信業者採用的大數據系統的前端界面。

 工作內容包含:
1. 後端軟體開發
2. 研究及改善後端工作流程
3. 改善網頁使用者經驗 
4. 後端平台效能調教 
5. 可以配合團隊合作 
6. 持續學習並分享應用相關技巧

We are looking for a highly motivated and talented Java Web software engineer. As a part of the core software team, You will be responsible for developing world-class web-based software platform, that will support mobile operators better improve their network and enable various applications.

 You will be working closely with various cross-functional teams like radio access engineers, PM, QA, research to gather requirements, analyze software system requirements, and successfully complete your tasks.

 You will be working closely with field engineers to handle customer issues.
 Extensive software development experience including sustaining and new product development is a must. Some amount of travel is involved.

 * Required Qualifications:
 - 1+ years of software development experience in web development or Java.
 - Familiar with Object Oriented Programming.
 - Familiar with database (MySQL).
 - Familiar with some of the following: MySQL, Spring Framework, Linux shell, JavaScript
- BS or greater, preferably in Computer Science, Electrical / Electronics Engineering or a related field.
 - Self-motivated, with positive attitude, a fast learner and team player

companyName: 西門子股份有限公司
description:
西門子是一家跨國企業致力於電氣化產業、自動控制和數位化技術。台灣西門子近年來也致力於年輕學子的培育，於暑假舉辦為期兩個月的西門子菁英培育暑期實習計劃，提供理工及商業相關科系的在學青年暑假期間進入西門子大家庭實習的機會。被錄取的同學將到特定部門實習兩個月，親身體驗國際公司文化及工作環境，參與及了解各職務的工作流程及工作給予的責任感和成就感，建立國際觀，以利畢業後的職涯發展。課程提供了一個含蓋實體及網絡平台及內容完整的訓練，使青年學子得以熟悉西門子的技術職能。
經評選過的學生在這8週內將由指定的導師指派實習工作，同時需參與團體活動。學生在實習結束時需完成結業簡報。

報名時間即日起至2018/5/15止

應徵方式 :請直接投遞英文履歷和自傳到有興趣的實習職缺，面試通知將於五月中旬統一發出。

譜迅資訊，累積三十年經驗的商業解決方案軟體開發公司。
隨著應用環境的進步以及對作效率的要求，許多應用漸漸導入AI的應用。本公司軟體開發之商業智慧組開發一套可以協助中大型公司提升行政效率的應用系統。經過數家醫療及金融機構使用的反映，導入系統後至少提升70%的作業效率，同時也落實管理的精確性。
本套系統的特色在於結合Workfow及ERP的優點，並且補足其不足部分以予加強。

本公司非常歡迎有經驗的志同道合朋友或有興趣踏入資訊產業的人士，加入譜迅成為工作夥伴。

jobName: 【Asia Pacific Tax Centre】Tax Technology and Transformation – Manager and Senior Consultant
companyName: 安永聯合會計師事務所
description:
Types of projects you can expect to be involved in:
• Tax Function Evaluation and Optimization: Evaluate or optimize tax operation structure by assessing current state, benchmarking with leading practice, providing optimization solution options, etc.
• Process and Controls Enhancement: Re-design and deploy streamlined tax processes including new technology solutions with clear roles and responsibilities, standardized work processes, proper controls embedded to manage risks.
• Data and Systems Effectiveness: Embed the needs of Tax into Finance and IT systems to increase automation and data quality throughout tax processes; automate tax processing, tax compliance and reporting through various tax technologies.
• Risk Management: Assess and prioritize tax risks to establish a proper control environment that takes into account the various regulatory regimes.

To qualify, candidates should have:
• A bachelor’s degree in computer science or information systems and approximately 3-5 years of relevant work experience
• Good object-oriented design and coding skills in C#, VBA
• Experience and good working knowledge in the following areas:
o .Net Framework
o Development of front-end web pages - html, css, javascript, jquery, and common framework as bootstrap etc.
o MS SharePoint
o MS SQL Server - SQL, triggers, functions, stored procedures, the preparation of capacity.
o Computer science fundamentals
o Software engineering, project management knowledge and experience
o C/S and B/S model development
o Knowledge and experience in RPA software (e.g., Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, UiPath) is a plus.
o Knowledge and experience in business intelligence software (e.g., Tableau, Alteryx, Qlik) is a plus.
• Strong leadership, attention to detail, problem-solving skills
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Mandarin
• Outgoing and proactive personality

We also seek candidates with a keen interest and experience in improving the performance of tax functions, the demonstrated ability to team with and motivate others, and willingness to develop meaningful and influential relationships with clients and colleagues. Experience in one or more of the following areas is a plus:
• Tax compliance and reporting
• Accounting and finance
• Development and/or implementation of tax technology
• Finance or tax performance improvement
• Experience in the development and/or implementation of tax technology solutions
